colors_on_map module¶

Created on Sun Jun 20 23:53:23 2021

@author: matte

colors_on_map.color_map_display(color_for_each_area, all_area_data, areas_names_list, myMap)[source]¶

Display the final color for each area of the map.

Parameters

  • color_for_each_area (list) – The list of (str) color for every area.

  • all_area_data (list) – The list that contain every information from the areas.

  • areas_names (list) – The list of (str) names for each area.

  • myMap (folium.folium.map) – The folium map

Returns

Nothing, just display directly the colored areas on the map using folium
